review: Dr saumya has explained me each and every process step by Step,before dr starts process by showing and explaining what are the process and showing after what are the changes we got and make patient very comfortable by making sure of comfort if we feel uncomfortable dr will have small talk and make me comfortable and then the process is like smooth I didn’t got much pain as I was heard by many people maybe it’s because of the her making sure the comfort of patient

I recently got my crown and bridges at Skyline dental and my experience with Dr Saumya was good.  She was very patient in understanding my problem and thoroughly explained to me the treatment she planned. She also gave me all the options in my budget which helped me take decisions. The results were really good and i got lot of compliments from my friends and family.

Great staff and beautiful office! I hadn’t changed Dentist in over 20 years and they made it such a smooth and easy transition. Dr, Saumya was so gentle on my gums and teeth! So happy to be a new client here!
